title: White House blasts harassment of reporter who asked Modi about human rights record
description: Wall Street Journal reporter Sabrina Siddiqui posed her question to Indian Prime Minister Narendra Modi at a joint press conference with President Joe Biden.

title: Prosecutors will pursue death penalty in slayings of 4 University of Idaho students
description: Prosecutors will pursue the death penalty against the man charged in the quadruple murder of four Idaho college students, according to court documents filed Monday.

title: Experimental drug could offer more weight loss than any drug on the market, study finds
description: A new weight loss drug could be the most effective drug available, though it won't be available for several years. Lilly's retatrutide  led to 58 pounds of weight loss.

title: Supreme Court rebuffs OSU and enables the remaining sex abuse victims to sue
description: The Supreme Court handed Ohio State University a defeat by refusing to reconsider a lower court ruling that said former students should be allowed to sue the university for failing to protect them from a sexual predator decades ago.

title: Club Q shooter sentenced to life in prison for attack on gay nightclub
description: The Club Q shooter accused of killing five people and injuring 17 others at the gay nightclub in Colorado Springs pleaded guilty Monday.

title: Five or six Secret Service agents have testified before Jan. 6 grand jury, sources say
description: Five or six Secret Service agents have testified before the grand jury that will decide whether to indict former President Trump for his alleged role in the Jan. 6 Capitol riot.

title: Ron DeSantis vows to send the military to block drugs from reaching Mexican ports
description: Florida Gov. Ron DeSantis on Monday released the first formal policy of his presidential campaign, a slew of immigration-related proposals.

title: Jesse Watters replaces Tucker Carlson in Fox News prime-time hour
description: Jesse Watters, a Fox News host who rose from production assistant to one of the network’s big stars, will take over the 8 p.m. slot vacated by Tucker Carlson.

title: Aspen Ideas Festival kicks off with former Google CEO speaking about AI
description: Aspen Ideas Festival kicks off with former Google CEO speaking about AI

title: Supreme Court paves the way for Louisiana congressional districts to be redrawn
description: The Supreme Court dismissed Louisiana's appeal seeking to prevent its congressional map being redrawn over claims it dilutes the influence of Black voters.

title: Man dead and another hospitalized after boat hits ferry near Miami port
description: A man was killed early Sunday and cruise line arrivals were disrupted after a 30-foot boat hit a ferry near Miami, authorities said.

title: Teen who died on Titanic sub brought Rubik's cube with him in bid to break world record
description: Suleman Dawood, the 19-year-old who died in the Titan submersible alongside his father and three others, had brought a Rubik's cube on the journey in hopes of breaking a world record, his mother has said.

title: Colleges anxiously await a landmark Supreme Court affirmative action decision
description: Facing a potential Supreme Court ban on Affirmative Action, some top schools are devising alternative ways of fostering diversity on campus.

title: Democrats warn party: The threat of Trump winning in 2024 is 'very real'
description: New NBC News polling shows President Joe Biden with a relatively narrow 49 percent to 45 percent lead over Donald Trump — within the survey’s margin of error.

title: Russian defense minister appears for first time since Wagner rebellion aimed to oust him
description: Russian defense minister Sergei Shoigu has appeared in public for the first time since Wagner mercenary chief Yevgeny Prigozhin's armed rebellion sought to oust him and challenged President Vladimir Putin.

title: Ron DeSantis tours the Texas border ahead of rolling out his immigration platform
description: Amid sagging national poll numbers, Florida Gov. Ron DeSantis toured part of the Texas border Sunday as he prepared to roll out new immigration policy proposals.

title: Effective pills for weight loss, including an oral version of Ozempic, are on the horizon
description: Drugmakers are racing to be the first to market with an oral version of drugs like Ozempic and Wegovy. A pill may be more palatable to some.
